i am never disappointed with there food.
As usual the omikase didn't disappoint in freshness, although it scored low on creativity and selection.
They have a huge selection of different cream cheeses and all of their salads are great.

With so many good restaurants on the UWS, I don't need overpriced food, absurdly arrogant wait-staff who don't recognize they work at a glorified diner, clumsy service, and management that doesn't care.

sentences_texts: My quesadilla tasted like it had been made by a three-year old with no sense of proportion or flavor.

Every time in New York I make it a point to visit Restaurant Saul on Smith Street.
